Record # SummaryRendering Overview 60 fps call stack Animation Frame FiredrequestAnimationFrame()function callupdateupdate()requestAnimationFrame() update eventDevToolsforced reflow, forced reflowSummaryLayout Forced (update @ forcedsync.html:457) sources offsetTopleft # offsetTop, ``` function update(timestamp) { for (var m = 0; m < movers.length; m++) { movers[m].style.left = ((Math.sin(m + timestamp / 1000) + 1) * 500) + 'px'; // movers[m].style.left = ((Math.sin(m + timestamp/1000)+1) * 500) + 'px'; } raf = window.requestAnimationFrame(update); } ``` # timeline 60fps

Post.title: jsyarn
Post._content: 20161011facebook javascript yarn, npm (nodejs )yarn yarn 1. yarnnpm 2. yarn 3. yarn 4. # yarnnpm [](https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn)yarn6 ## yarn npm nodeinstall()()yarnyarncacheinstall ## npm A, B, C package.json A, B, C A D, E, F D G, H node_modules BUG. npm ``` npm init -y npm install globule@0.1.0 -S npm install babel-generator@6.19.0 -S npm install babel-helper-define-map@6.18.0 -S ``` 3lodashglobulelodash@1.0.3,lodash@4.x lodashlodash ``` var lodash = require('lodash'); console.log(lodash.VERSION); // v1.0.3 ``` `npm install`, lodash4.xyarnBUG ## `` ## yarnnpm ## npm bower, ## yarn1.2yarnbabel-generatorbabel-helper-define-map lodash ## emojis o()o # yarnnodeN[](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/install#alternatives-tab)`npm install yarn -g`brewyum # yarn ## `yarn init`[](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/init) npmpackage ``` question name (testdir): my-awesome-package question version (1.0.0): question description: The best package you will ever find. question entry point (index.js): question git repository: https://github.com/yarnpkg/example-yarn-package question author: Yarn Contributor question license (MIT): success Saved package.json Done in 87.70s. ``` `--yes/-y` (yes),package.json ## package.jsonyarn.lock ### `yarn add [package]@[version/tag]`,[](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/add) package.jsondependencies,yarn.lock ``` { "name": "my-package", "dependencies": { + "package-1": "^1.0.0" } } ``` dependencies 1. `yarn add --dev/-D` devDependencies 2. `yarn add --peer/-P` peerDependencies 3. `yarn add --optional/-O` optionalDependencies ### `yarn upgrade [package]@[version/tag]`,[](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/upgrade) package.jsonyarn.lock ``` { "name": "my-package", "dependencies": { - "package-1": "^1.0.0" + "package-1": "^2.0.0" } } ``` ### `yarn remove [package]` package.jsonyarn.lock ## `yarn install`,[](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/install) package.jsonyarn.lock`yarn install`yarn.lock 1. `yarn install --flat` 2. `yarn install --force` 3. `yarn install --production` dependencies ## yarnglobal add,bin,ls,remove,upgrade `npm install gulp -g`,`yarn global add gulp` # 1. npm register `yarn config set registry 'https://registry.npm.taobao.org'`,npmyarn 2. yarn`yarn self-update` 3. `npm shrinkwrap`yarn # [ js yarn ](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/22967139) [yarn cli doc](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/)
